summary:
This patch enabled the AP animations through new dialog for slaves captured using Paradise Halls.
No scripts were altered and very few dialog conditions were changed.
For use with Paradise Halls 0.7.3
descriptionHtml:
This patch enables the AP animations through new dialog for slaves captured using Paradise Halls.
No scripts were altered and very few dialog conditions were changed.

For use with Paradise Halls 0.7.3

Installation is simple, It's a single esp file. use wryebash or whichever file manager you like, or manually extract to your game data folder.
This will work for all previous captured slaves as well as any new slaves. There is one negative side effect currently, in that you need to work a bit harder to get the let's talk option for non slave playmates. I am in the process of finding a better solution there while also adding in dialog to command your slave to perform tasks similar to the companion options.
Any suggestions are of course welcome. and please report any bugs you find.
author: Ghostwalker71

files.name: GW71_PAH_AP_Patcher
files.changelogHtml: Added new dialog to command your slaves to perform actions as a follower would.
